name: The Emotionmancer
description:
The Emotionmancer is a very short RPG MAKER game made in 2 days for RPG Maker Jam #3.

The Emotionmancer receives a letter from a friend asking for help in investigating a new bar that has recently opened in town.
By gathering and spreading emotions, the Emotionmancer must pass a guard to confront the owner themself.
Let me know of any bugs or issues.

Languages:

  • English - full
  • French - menu only
